overview:
Investment Director of InnovationsKapital. Peder has been involved in over 20 investments in ICT companies since he joined InnovationsKapital in 1997. Some examples of companies where he has been more closely involved in are Altitun (acq. by ADC), Kreatel (acq. by Motorola), and Nordnav (acq. by CSR). He represents InnKap on the boards of Heptagon, Syntune and 21 Grams.

Peder holds an MBA certificate from the University of North Carolina, an executive MBA from Stockholm School of Economics, an MSc in Business Administration and Economics from GÃ¶teborg University and has studied engineering at Chalmers University of Technology.
